mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.record_id AS "recordId", a.item_id AS "itemId", a.item_name AS "itemName", a.need_samples AS "needSamples", a.sample_code AS "sampleCode", a.result_dict_id AS "resultDictId", a.result_dict_name AS "resultDictName", a.result_flag AS "resultFlag", a.result_remarks AS "resultRemarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.examination_flag AS "examinationFlag", a.last_flag AS "lastFlag", a.specimen_id as "specimenId"
LEFT JOIN bj_examination_record b ON b.id = a.record_id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM bj_examination_record_item a
WHERE a.id = #{id} and a.del_flag=0

SELECT
FROM bj_examination_record_item a
WHERE a.record_id = #{recordId} AND a.item_id = #{itemId} AND a.last_flag = 1 and a.del_flag=0 ORDER BY a.create_date DESC LIMIT 0,1

SELECT
FROM bj_examination_record_item a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} and last_flag=1 and ((a.need_samples =1 and a.sample_code is null ) or a.result_flag = 0)
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.create_date DESC

SELECT
FROM bj_examination_record_item a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} and last_flag=1 and ((a.need_samples = 1 and a.sample_code is not null and a.result_flag is null) or a.result_flag = 0)
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.create_date DESC

SELECT
FROM bj_examination_record_item a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} and last_flag=1 and a.result_flag = 1 and b.status < 40

SELECT count(a.id) cnt FROM bj_examination_record_item a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND a.sample_code = #{sampleCode}

SELECT count(a.id) cnt FROM bj_examination_record_item a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND a.last_flag = '1' and (a.result_flag is null or a.result_flag = '0' )

SELECT count(a.id) cnt FROM bj_examination_record_item a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND a.last_flag = '1' and (a.result_flag is null )

SELECT count(a.id) cnt FROM bj_examination_record_item a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND a.last_flag = '1' and a.result_flag is null and a.sample_code is null

SELECT count(a.id) cnt FROM bj_examination_record_item a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND a.last_flag = '1' and (a.examination_flag = '2' )

SELECT COUNT(a.id) FROM bj_examination_record_item a
a.del_flag=#{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND a.result_dict_id IS NOT NULL

SELECT COUNT(a.id) FROM bj_examination_record_item a
a.del_flag=#{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND (a.result_dict_id IS NULL OR a.result_dict_id = '')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bj_examination_record_item( id, record_id, item_id, item_name, need_samples, sample_code, specimen_id, result_dict_id, result_dict_name, result_flag, result_remarks, del_flag, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, examination_flag, last_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{recordId}, #{itemId}, #{itemName}, #{needSamples}, #{sampleCode}, #{specimenId}, #{resultDictId}, #{resultDictName}, #{resultFlag}, #{resultRemarks}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{examinationFlag}, #{lastFlag} )
